article: Every year , the French town of Menton hosts an event called the Lemon Festival in the world . The Lemon Festival usually takes place between mid - February until March . During the festival , around 145 tons of oranges and lemons are sent into the town . Over 300 workers work together to make giant sculptures out of fruits . Menton became the first producer of lemons in 1929 . The lemons are loved by the world ' s best cooks . In the late 19th century , a town parade was held to encourage Menton ' s winter tourism . Kings , princes and artists filled the great and comfortable hotels or their own fantastic houses . Because of its great success , the streets were beautifully planted with oranges and lemons in the following years . In order to develop tourism , in 1934 the Lemon Festival was officially born . Sleepy Menton becomes a world of color during the festival time . People find it very exciting and full of fun . The festival is enjoyed for three whole weeks . Along with a daily Lemon and Orange Exhibition , parades on Sundays , fireworks on Thursday nights . Every year there will be a special theme for the Lemon festival . This year the theme of the Lemon Festival is : " The regions of France " . Some of the events are free , but you need to buy tickets to see the parades .
